events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer position and appreciate your interest in joining our team.
Your application has been reviewed and categorized under the Engineering department for the Software Engineer role.
A recruiter has been assigned to your application and will be reaching out soon to discuss the next steps.
The initial screening interview is complete. Your experience in software development aligns well with the job requirements.
We have scheduled your technical interview for May 10th at 2:00 PM UTC to further assess your engineering skills.
Your technical interview was completed successfully. The interviewers were impressed with your coding proficiency and problem-solving skills.
An HR interview has been scheduled for May 15th to discuss company culture, benefits, and other employment details with you.
Your HR interview went well, and you showed excellent alignment with our company values and expectations.
We are pleased to extend you a formal job offer for the Software Engineer position, including details about compensation and benefits.
Thank you for your positive feedback on the offer. We are excited about the prospect of you joining our engineering team.
You have accepted the offer. Welcome aboard! We look forward to your contributions here at our company.
Your onboarding process has officially started. Our team will guide you through all necessary training and orientation sessions.
The hiring process is complete, and you are now officially a Software Engineer at our company. Congratulations and welcome!
